{{ja-kanjitab|ほう|か|yomi=o}}

===Etymology===
From {{etyl|ltc|ja|sort=ほうか}} compound {{m|ltc|放火|tr=pjangH xwaX||let loose” + “fire}}. Compare modern {{cog|zh|放火|tr=fànghuǒ}}.

===Pronunciation===
* {{l|ja|sc=Latn|音読み|On'yomi}}
* {{ja-accent-common|h|ほ|うか}}<ref name="NHK">{{R:NHK Hatsuon}}</ref>
* {{IPA|lang=ja|[ho̞ːka̠]}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|ほうか|hhira=はうくわ}}

# [[arson]], [[set fire|setting fire]] to something

====Derived terms====
{{der-top}}
* {{ja-l|放火狂|ほうかきょう|hōkakyō}}: [[pyromania]]

* {{ja-l|放火者|ほうかしゃ|hōkasha}}: an [[arsonist]]
* {{ja-l|放火犯人|ほうかはんにん|hōka hannin}}: an arsonist
* {{ja-l|放火魔|ほうかま|hōkama}}: a [[habitual]] arsonist
